ing: 1 (8 ounce) package fat free cream cheese
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie crumb crust
des: "This pie is soooo rich, but you'll beg for more!!!"
ins:
In a large bowl, beat together cream cheese and peanut butter until well combined. Stir in honey and vanilla. Finally, fold in whipped topping and peanut butter chips.
Spoon whole mixture into pie crust, then allow to chill overnight.
